byline.original: By LIZ ROBBINS and LIAM STACK

abstract: Rockaway Township, NJ, officials say Boy Scout troop leader Christopher Petronino was attacked by bear while on hike at Split Rock Reservoir; is treated for bites and scratches to his scalp and legs.
lead_paragraph: A New Jersey man who was hiking with three Boy Scouts at Split Rock Reservoir was treated for injuries to his scalp and legs after a black bear pulled him into a cave.

headline.main: Scout Leader Is Attacked by a Bear
headline.print_headline: Scout Leader Is Attacked by a Bear

snippet: A New Jersey man who was hiking with three Boy Scouts at Split Rock Reservoir was treated for injuries to his scalp and legs after a black bear pulled him into a cave.
